rules_text:
Miasmic Cove enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
{4}{BG}: Miasmic Cove becomes a 2/3 black and green Snake creature with deathtouch until end of turn. It’s still a land. This ability costs {X} less to activate, where X is your devotion to black and green. Activate only once each turn.
